Html:
hi i am trying to set deliveryMethod=SpecifiedPickupDirectory to send email .

but application is not working with the setting.

does it need any extra configuration?

 

Thanks

Pragnesh

Hi Pragnesh

Smtp4dev does not currently support picking up mail from a directory. This has been suggested in the past and I may consider adding it in the future. Any other users reading this who want to vote for this feature please reply to this thread to let me know and I will be more likely to look at it.

Thanks
Rob

I think it will be a good addition.

Actually I think it is an important requirement but I don't understand why no one has voted for it yet.

 

Thanks

Ali
